name: emp1
r2rml:
@prefix : <http://ejemplo.org/mapping/>.
@prefix rr: <http://www.w3.org/ns/r2rml#>.
@prefix ex: <http://ejemplo.org/>.
@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>.
@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>.
@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>.

:TriplesMap_emp a rr:TriplesMap;
    rr:logicalTable :TriplesMap_emp_LogicalTable.
:TriplesMap_emp_LogicalTable rr:tableName "emp".
:TriplesMap_emp rr:subjectMap :TriplesMap_emp_SubjectMap.
:TriplesMap_emp_SubjectMap rr:template "http://ejemplo.org/emp/{emp_no}";
    rr:class ex:Emp.
:TriplesMap_emp rr:predicateObjectMap :TriplesMap_emp_POM_0.
:TriplesMap_emp_POM_0 rr:predicateMap :TriplesMap_emp_PredicateMap_0.
:TriplesMap_emp_PredicateMap_0 rr:constant <http://ejemplo.org/emp#apellido>.
:TriplesMap_emp_POM_0 rr:objectMap :TriplesMap_emp_ObjectMap_0.
:TriplesMap_emp_ObjectMap_0 rr:column "apellido";
    rr:datatype xsd:string.
:TriplesMap_emp rr:predicateObjectMap :TriplesMap_emp_POM_1.
:TriplesMap_emp_POM_1 rr:predicateMap :TriplesMap_emp_PredicateMap_1.
:TriplesMap_emp_PredicateMap_1 rr:constant <http://ejemplo.org/emp#oficio>.
:TriplesMap_emp_POM_1 rr:objectMap :TriplesMap_emp_ObjectMap_1.
:TriplesMap_emp_ObjectMap_1 rr:column "oficio";
    rr:datatype xsd:string.
:TriplesMap_emp rr:predicateObjectMap :TriplesMap_emp_POM_2.
:TriplesMap_emp_POM_2 rr:predicateMap :TriplesMap_emp_PredicateMap_2.
:TriplesMap_emp_PredicateMap_2 rr:constant <http://ejemplo.org/emp#dir>.
:TriplesMap_emp_POM_2 rr:objectMap :TriplesMap_emp_ObjectMap_2.
:TriplesMap_emp_ObjectMap_2 rr:column "dir";
    rr:datatype xsd:integer.
:TriplesMap_emp rr:predicateObjectMap :TriplesMap_emp_POM_3.
:TriplesMap_emp_POM_3 rr:predicateMap :TriplesMap_emp_PredicateMap_3.
:TriplesMap_emp_PredicateMap_3 rr:constant <http://ejemplo.org/emp#fecha_alt>.
:TriplesMap_emp_POM_3 rr:objectMap :TriplesMap_emp_ObjectMap_3.
:TriplesMap_emp_ObjectMap_3 rr:column "fecha_alt";
    rr:datatype xsd:string.
:TriplesMap_emp rr:predicateObjectMap :TriplesMap_emp_POM_4.
:TriplesMap_emp_POM_4 rr:predicateMap :TriplesMap_emp_PredicateMap_4.
:TriplesMap_emp_PredicateMap_4 rr:constant <http://ejemplo.org/emp#salario>.
:TriplesMap_emp_POM_4 rr:objectMap :TriplesMap_emp_ObjectMap_4.
:TriplesMap_emp_ObjectMap_4 rr:column "salario";
    rr:datatype xsd:decimal.
:TriplesMap_emp rr:predicateObjectMap :TriplesMap_emp_POM_5.
:TriplesMap_emp_POM_5 rr:predicateMap :TriplesMap_emp_PredicateMap_5.
:TriplesMap_emp_PredicateMap_5 rr:constant <http://ejemplo.org/emp#comision>.
:TriplesMap_emp_POM_5 rr:objectMap :TriplesMap_emp_ObjectMap_5.
:TriplesMap_emp_ObjectMap_5 rr:column "comision";
    rr:datatype xsd:decimal.
:TriplesMap_emp rr:predicateObjectMap :TriplesMap_emp_POM_6.
:TriplesMap_emp_POM_6 rr:predicateMap :TriplesMap_emp_PredicateMap_6.
:TriplesMap_emp_PredicateMap_6 rr:constant <http://ejemplo.org/emp#dept_no>.
:TriplesMap_emp_POM_6 rr:objectMap :TriplesMap_emp_ObjectMap_6.
:TriplesMap_emp_ObjectMap_6 rr:column "dept_no";
    rr:datatype xsd:integer.
